extendedInfo.description: Call the world for $30/yearâ¦no monthly fees, no long distance charges.  FREE TRIALComwave Mobileâ¢ is the only Mobile App that eliminates long distance charges to over 57 countries from your smartphone.  There are NO monthly bills with Comwave Mobile and you can call 57 countries free for a full year. Visit our website for a full list of countries.Download the 100-minute FREE TRIAL today and youâre ready to make free calls around the world. After the trial, purchase Comwave Mobile for just $30/year:$30/year Includes:- Ability to change your Caller ID- 250 free local & long distance minutes per month for 12 months to call across the street or around the globe (That's 3000 free minutes to 57 countries)- Lower rates than Skype if you go over the free 250 minutes/month or call outside of the 57 countries.- No monthly fees....Just an annual fee of $30. Itâs so simple to use, just dial as you would normally and the App will spring into action and connect your call through Comwave.*** If you go over the allotted free 250 minutes per month, you will be billed a low per-minute rate listed on our website...cheaperthan Skype...we promise.*** Calls to mobile phones in some countries are not free.  See www.comwave.net/mobile for the full list of included destinations.  keywords: free long distance, voip, sip, skype

reviews.title: This is only VOIP app
reviews.comment: Editing my previous review: What you read below, now is the opposite. You cannot dial through regular phone line using this app. You need internet connection, so this is just another VOIP. If you are away and have no internet conn. but have a phone signal, you cannot use this app.  My origianl review: \"I have a regular Comwave long distance account, and needed an app to dial overseas ld numbers straight from my phonebook, without dialing access no. first. This app enabled me to do exactly that. It would be nice if it would have possibility for some exclusions, instead of asking for every ld no. E.g. I just need overseas numbers to dial throug Comwave, and don\'t need to be asked for North America.\"
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing app!

reviews.title: Dubious and fraudulent
reviews.comment: As everyone can see in the description above.\' Call the World $30 /yr \'. Paid $30 I call and after collecting the $30 3Weeks or so later I was charged about $123 minute by minute calls in addition to the $30. They will store ur credit card info and charge it at will. $30/yr normally  a single transaction require no storage. Disgraceful and deceitful company.
reviews.author: A Google User
